description: This source file contains functions and an exported API to generate a Word document (DOCX) with a focus on creating an 'Actions' table based on provided schema and data. It includes utility functions for text normalization, formatting, and constructing document elements using the 'docx' library.

methods.name: normalizeLabel(label)
methods.description: Converts a label into a stable, URL- and ID-friendly string by lowercasing and replacing non-alphanumeric characters.

methods.name: cleanValue(v)
methods.description: Cleans display string values by removing placeholder underscores and trimming artifacts.

methods.name: toProfessionalLabel(keyOrLabel)
methods.description: Converts snake_case or dot notation keys into human-readable, capitalized labels.

methods.name: formatValue(v)
methods.description: Formats a value for display; handles arrays, objects, and nulls appropriately.

methods.name: buildOrderedActionFields(templateSchema = {}, templateData = {})
methods.description: Generates an ordered list of field definitions for the 'Actions' table, avoiding duplicates and respecting schema order.

methods.name: getByPath(obj, path, fallback = "")
methods.description: Retrieves a nested property value from an object using a dotted path string.

methods.name: buildActionsTable({ templateSchema, templateData })
methods.description: Constructs a DOCX table of actions, with labels and data values, for inclusion in the document.

methods.name: buildHeader()
methods.description: Creates a minimal header for the document.

methods.name: buildFooter()
methods.description: Creates a minimal footer for the document.

methods.name: buildSowDocx(data, templateSchema)
methods.description: Main exported function that builds the DOCX document blob containing the Actions table.

methods.name: makeSowDocxFilename(data)
methods.description: Generates a filename for the generated DOCX based on metadata and current date.

methods.name: makeCell( children, { widthPct, vAlign = VerticalAlign.TOP, padding = 200, opts = {} } = {} )
para( text, { bold = false, size = 21, align = AlignmentType.LEFT, after = 80 } = {} )
